about_the_game:
Kandra: The Moonwalker is a 3D platformer demo inspired by the great classics of Nintendo 64 and PlayStation like Spyro or Banjo Kazooie. In Kandra's universe the other Moonwalkers have disappeared and with them the magic has diseppeared. Kandra's goal as one of the last remaining Moonwalkers is to find her friends and recover the magic feathers.

Find collectibles!


Collect feathers, gems and other collectibles to unlock abilities, open portals and progress towards your goal: collecting all the magic feathers and returning magic to the world.

Defeat enemies and bosses!


Fight against enemies that want to block your waym, from mere minions to bosses. Use different skills for different combat situations.

Get new skills for Kandra!


Unlock new skills to face enemies in new ways and overcome environmental challenges.

Explore the different worlds and bring back the magic!


Explore worlds, help their inhabitants, beat the bad guys and collect gems and feathers to restore order.

Do you want to learn to create videogames like Kandra the Moonwalker?

Use our link to access our free course and create your first 3D game in Unity today

Kandra: The Moonwalker is a 3D platformer demo inspired by the great classics of Nintendo 64 and PlayStation like Spyro or Banjo Kazooie. In Kandra's universe the other Moonwalkers have disappeared and with them the magic has diseppeared. Kandra's goal as one of the last remaining Moonwalkers is to find her friends and recover the magic feathers.

Find collectibles!


Collect feathers, gems and other collectibles to unlock abilities, open portals and progress towards your goal: collecting all the magic feathers and returning magic to the world.

Defeat enemies and bosses!


Fight against enemies that want to block your waym, from mere minions to bosses. Use different skills for different combat situations.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra (10.13)+
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra (10.13)+
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX580
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Kandra The Moonwalker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: i5 8600K or r5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX580 / Nvidia GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Kandra The Moonwalker is a 3D platformer demo inspired by the great classics of N64 and PlayStation. Find collectibles, explore different worlds, unlock habilities, and return magic to the world by recovering the magic feathers.
